Name: team_status_active
Description: Only consider teams that are currently active.

Name: user_story_status_not_done
Description: Only include user stories that are not yet completed.

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Only consider features with high priority.

Name: sprint_status_active
Description: Only consider sprints that are currently in progress.

Name: worker_availability_positive
Description: Only consider workers who are currently available.

Name: role_area_responsibility_valid
Description: Verify that role's area of responsibility is defined.

Name: stakeholder_influence_positive
Description: Consider stakeholders with a positive influence level.

Name: velocity_trend_positive
Description: Select teams with a positive velocity trend.

Name: task_type_implementation
Description: Tasks should be of implementation type
